mapper.update: update sea_arcrank set rank = #{rank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, membername = #{membername,jdbcType=CHAR}, adminrank = #{adminrank,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, scores = #{scores,jdbcType=INTEGER}, purviews = #{purviews,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select id, rank, membername, adminrank, money, scores, purviews from sea_arcrank
